articles.title: NASA says Asteroid 2023 WZ3 will pass Earth today; Know details of this close encounter - HT Tech
articles.description: An Apollo group asteroid designated as Asteroid 2023 WZ3 is expected to pass Earth today, January 11, NASA has revealed. Know its speed, size, distance of approach, and other details.
